Package BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors

Class MotorIOSim

java.lang.Object
BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors.MotorIOSim
All Implemented Interfaces:
MotorIO
public class MotorIOSim extends Object implements MotorIO
Simulated implementation of the MotorIO interface. This class uses WPILib's DCMotorSim to simulate real motor behavior, including position and velocity control via PID.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface BobcatLib.Hardware.Motors.MotorIO

    MotorIO.MotorIOInputs

  • Constructor Details

    • MotorIOSim

      public MotorIOSim(MotorBuilder builder, CANDeviceDetails device)
      Constructs a new MotorIOSim instance using the provided builder and device info.
      Parameters:
      builder - The MotorBuilder configuration for this motor
      device - The CAN device details associated with this motor

    • MotorIOSim

      public MotorIOSim(MotorBuilder builder, CANDeviceDetails device, double inertia)
      Constructs and initializes the sim motor for either velocity or position control based on isPositionControl.
      Parameters:
      builder - The MotorBuilder used to configure the simulation
      device - The CAN device being simulated
      inertia - The moment of inertia of the mechanism

    • setVelocityClosedLoop

      public void setVelocityClosedLoop(double velocityRadPerSec)
      Enables closed-loop velocity control with the given setpoint.

    • setMotorPIDandFF

      public void setMotorPIDandFF(double kp, double kd, double kv, double ka, double ks)
      Sets PID and feedforward parameters based on the control mode.
      Parameters:
      kp - Proportional gain
      kd - Derivative gain
      kv - Velocity feedforward gain
      ka - Acceleration feedforward gain (unused)
      ks - Static feedforward gain (unused)
